products.title: Classic Crewneck
products.description: A classic crewneck is a timeless top defined by its round, collarless neckline that sits close to the base of the neck. It’s commonly made from cotton, fleece, or knit fabric, offering comfort and versatility
products.descriptionHtml: A classic crewneck is a timeless top defined by its round, collarless neckline that sits close to the base of the neck. It’s commonly made from cotton, fleece, or knit fabric, offering comfort and versatility

metafields.value: Highlight quality over quantity, craftsmanship, and investment-worthy pieces.
Classic Crewneck | Quiet Luxury Style | Shop Now

products.title: Classic Boots
products.description: Classic boots are timeless footwear designed for both style and durability. They typically feature a sturdy sole, enclosed heel, and ankle-high or taller shaft, providing support and protection. Made from materials like leather or suede, classic boots often have clean lines and minimal detailing, which gives them a versatile, refined look.
products.descriptionHtml: Classic boots are timeless footwear designed for both style and durability. They typically feature a sturdy sole, enclosed heel, and ankle-high or taller shaft, providing support and protection. Made from materials like leather or suede, classic boots often have clean lines and minimal detailing, which gives them a versatile, refined look.

products.title: Trench Coat
products.description: A trench coat is a long, lightweight coat traditionally made from water-resistant fabric, designed to protect against rain and wind. It typically features a double-breasted front, wide lapels, shoulder epaulettes, a belted waist, and often storm flaps for added protection.
products.descriptionHtml: A trench coat is a long, lightweight coat traditionally made from water-resistant fabric, designed to protect against rain and wind. It typically features a double-breasted front, wide lapels, shoulder epaulettes, a belted waist, and often storm flaps for added protection.

products.title: Jeans
products.description: Jeans are a type of casual pants typically made from denim, a durable cotton fabric. They are known for their sturdy construction, usually featuring riveted pockets, a zipper or button fly, and belt loops. Originally designed as workwear because of their strength, jeans have become a universal fashion staple worn by people of all ages.
